description: Fitting easily fitting over winter footwear, Yakrax Chains provide traction and stability in snow and ice conditions. Constructed from case-hardened steel, the links maintain a low profile to comfortably fit over your shoe, without getting in the way of your daily activities.<br><br>Yaktrax Chains fit to a wide variety of footwear and provide critical traction in all ice and snow conditions. The individually TIG welded square links provide an abrupt edge that bites into ice, while the ladder pattern design enhances traction on packed snow. Made of case-hardened steel, the links maintain a low profile making them both comfortable and durable for prolonged use.
name: Chains
